```{r, include=FALSE}
library(glue)
library(tidyverse)

# Set this to true to have links turned into footnotes at the end of the document
PDF_EXPORT <- FALSE

# Holds all the links that were inserted for placement at the end
links <- c()

source('parsing_functions.R')

# Load csv with position info
position_data <- read_csv('positions.csv')
```

Main

Mike Trehern {#title}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


```{r}
intro_text <- "Accomplished Army Veteran and Director of Criminal Investigations with over 19 years of investigative experience and more than 17 years in successive leadership roles.  Seeking a new career opportunity in which I can apply an educational background in evaluation and analytics.  Skilled at analyzing data to assess program or policy impacts while looking for actionable insight and opportunities for improvement.  

I have travelled extensively and have a vast amount of experience working with governmental and non-governmental organizations around the world. Through my travels and networking, I have developed in-depth cultural awareness and a network of contacts in more than 20 countries spanning five continents."

cat(sanitize_links(intro_text))
```
